price: Ela corria diante de Nossos olhos. E fizemo-lo, como recompensa a quem fora renegado.
arabic: تَجۡرِي بِأَعۡيُنِنَا جَزَآءٗ لِّمَن كَانَ كُفِرَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: tajrī bi-aʿyuninā jazāan liman kāna kufira
